meanings.definition: Plan or invent (a complex procedure, system, or mechanism)
meanings.sent1: She devises a new game to play with her friends.
meanings.sent2: He devises a strategy to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The clever inventor devises a machine that makes pancakes automatically.
meanings.sent4: Her mind devises a plan as intricate as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: He devises a way to remember all the planets in order using a song.

meanings.definition: Leave (real or personal property) to someone by the terms of a will
meanings.sent1: The wealthy man devises his mansion to his only son.
meanings.sent2: She devises her antique jewelry collection to her niece.
meanings.sent3: In his will, he devises his vintage car to his best friend who loves cars.
meanings.sent4: The old lady devises her garden to the community to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: He devises his favorite book collection to the local library for everyone to read.
